name: CompletelyNovel
overview:
CompletelyNovel.com is an online book publishing platform, linking authors and small publishers to professional print-on-demand printers, online marketing tools and a community of readers and writers.

Writers can upload their manuscripts directly from Word, design a cover within an online cover creator and set their price. CompletelyNovel will then automatically produce files ready for distribution online and in print.

CompletelyNovel gives each author a shop front where they can offer readers an online preview of their work, sell printed copies of their books. CompletelyNovel uses a network of print-on-demand printers, offering printing services in UK, Europe and US.

Writers who sell their books through CompletelyNovel set the sale price themselves and keep 100% of the profit.

Writers can use CompletelyNovel to gain ratings, reviews and sales from other users and prove their book’s potential to publishers.

The service is free to subscribe to. There are premium subscriptions available for authors who want to sell their books through Amazon and other online retailers.
